trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter to convert data for an image index to and from one data type to another for use by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control.

For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56).
Typically, you do not directly create an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewImageIndexConverter>.
Instead, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> method of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewImageIndexConverter"></xref> class.
Access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewImageIndexConverter.%23ctor%2A> class through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
Converts the specified value object to a 32-bit signed integer object.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> to provide locale information.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to convert.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that represents the converted value.
Converts the specified object to the specified destination type.

An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context, which can be used to extract additional information about the environment this type converter is being invoked from.
This parameter or properties of this parameter can be `null`.
A <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> that provides locale information.
The object to convert, typically an index represented as an <xref href="System.Int32"></xref>.
The type to convert the object to, often a <xref href="System.String"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that represents the converted value.
Returns a collection of standard index values for the image list associated with the specified format context.

An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context, which can be used to extract additional information about the environment this type converter is being invoked from.
This parameter or properties of this parameter can be `null`.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection"></xref> that holds a standard set of valid index values.
If no image list is found, this collection will contain a single object with a value of -1.
Gets a value indicating `null` is valid in the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection"></xref> collection.
As implemented in this class, this property always returns `false`.
`true` if `null` is valid in the standard values collection; otherwise, `false`.
